preface.title: The Need for Animal Tracking
preface.para: Either for hunting or husbandry human beings have always observed and remembered animal movements. Today, with larger herds and more interaction between producers and infrastructure providers, more animal movements mean more information for the producer or provider to manage.

Computers, software applications and animal event sensors that record and manage animal movements and histories can ease the information management burden and reduce the cost for farm animal producers and livestock infrastructure providers.
